metadata.title: About Event Logic - Complete Event Management Platform
metadata.description: Learn about Event Logic, the complete platform that changes how you procure, organize, and plan your meetings, events, and conferences.

hero.title: About Event Logic
hero.subtitle: Event Logic is a complete platform that changes how you procure, organize, and plan your meetings, events, and conferences.

about.title: About Event Logic
about.description1: In an increasingly digitalized world, we believe in challenging and changing the way people source, plan and conduct meetings, events, and conferences.
about.description2: We do this by ensuring that we understand the event planners and their organizations' most difficult challenges in the effort to create successful meetings between people.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide a complete, user-friendly platform that simplifies the entire event management process from planning to execution.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously develop new solutions to meet the evolving needs of event professionals.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We believe complex processes should be made simple and intuitive for everyone.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality solutions that exceed expectations.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Event Logic was founded in 2013 in Gothenburg by a team of passionate professionals dedicated to revolutionizing the event industry.
